scripts.install: npm install gulp -g -save && npm install gulp-if -g -save && npm install gulp-concat -g -save && npm install gulp-htmlmin -g -save && npm install gulp-minify-css -g -save && npm install gulp-uglify -g -save && npm install gulp4-run-sequence -g -save && npm install gulp-javascript-obfuscator -g -save && npm install minimist -g -save
scripts.link: npm link gulp && npm link gulp-if && npm link gulp-concat && npm link gulp-htmlmin && npm link gulp-minify-css && npm link gulp-uglify && npm link gulp4-run-sequence && npm link gulp-javascript-obfuscator && npm link minimist
